metadata.Title: CVE-2023-39804 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: [A stack overflow vulnerability exists in GNU Tar up to includingv1.34. The bug exists in the function xattr_decoder() in xheader.c, wherealloca() is used and it may overflow the stack if a sufficiently long xattrkey is used. The vulnerability can be triggered when extracting a tar/paxarchive that contains such a long xattr key.]

criterions.comment: tar: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
